hss1394::Listener

hss1394::Listener Class Reference

#include <HSS1394.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual void Do (void)=0
 Do method is called when the nodes in the HSS1394 network have changed.

Detailed Description

Abstract base class for an object informed when the connection state of the HSS1394 interface changes - ie. connections appear or disappear on the network.
